title: LoW Brew Co. script
content:
I'm wondering if anyone can identify the script used on this packaging and on the LoW Brew Co. logo. Some similar typefaces such as [Stempel Elan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/stempel-elan/) and [Confetti TP](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipo-pepel/confetti-tp/) came up but they don't quite match. Ideas?

I can't seem to attach at the moment so I'll just link to the image [lowbrewco.com/wp-content/uploads/growler1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202315/http:/lowbrewco.com/wp-content/uploads/growler1.jpg)

Font: 

 Pacifico 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202315/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [growler1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202315/http:/typophile.com/files/growler1_2.jpg) | 83.09 KB |
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content: Looks like that's it. Thanks Dick Pape!
